The 3-0 Whitewash Means Team India Is Sitting Pretty At The Top Of The World Test Championship Points Table

The 3-0 Whitewash Means Team India Is Sitting Pretty At The Top Of The World Test Championship Points Table

India strengthened their position at the top of the World Test Championship table with maximum points thanks to the 3-0 whitewash vs South Africa.

BCCL

India gained 120 points, each Test being worth 40. The final one was won by an innings and 202 runs.

"The points range from 60 points for each match of a two-Test series to 24 for each match of a five-Test series," said the ICC's statement.

Earlier, India won 2-0 in West Indies have 240 points.

AFP

The chance to increase that tally shall come in the two Tests vs Bangladesh which begin on November 14.

The top two teams at the end of the league will play the final in 2021. The winners shall be crowned as the World Test Champions.
